title: New: Sophia Black – OVR AGN (Prod. by BASECAMP)
content:
I caught a few tracks from BASECAMP at SXSW this year, and they were awesome, despite playing on the worst stage set-up of the entire festival (Red Eyed Fly).

With 2013’s self titled EP still on heavy rotation, and their fanbase growing day by day, the trio have leant a hand to LA newcomer Sophia Black and her sumptuous new track, OVR AGN. Utilising her fantastic vocals, and their own production prowess, it’s a worthy follow up to her debut track, Kissing. Stream it below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
